array.string: Press the Option key while opening the Effects menu will display more options
Click and drag the mouse over axis scale to modify it
Click and press Control key over any view to display a contextual menu with several useful function
Use the Inspector window to modify the current view (either in static or in real-time window)
Press the key 'c' to change the cursor current channel in the following way: left channel, right channel, no channel (hidden)
It is possible to change graphically the trigger threshold in the real-time oscilloscope view by clicking and holding the Option key
